name: Decay: No Way Back (Pre-Alpha 0.1)
description:
Decay: No Way Back Description

In Kolonia, the drug scene is developing more and more. Decay, a cop, wants to get involved in this scene with his friend Parker, but when they sold a lot, there were side effects.

Decay: No Way Back (Function Test)

This version includes an individual interaction with one of the characters. 

If there are any bugs, please report them, thank you!

____________________________________________________________

developed by StyleKing (Wolf Peak Games Studio)

D: NWB Theme Song - Yellow Train by  PrimeBuZzHD
